thread.title: Say Yes to the Dress's Randy Fenoli Is Designing His Own Wedding Dresses Now
thread.title_full: Say Yes to the Dress's Randy Fenoli Is Designing His Own Wedding Dresses Now

author: Rachel Torgerson
title: Say Yes to the Dress's Randy Fenoli Is Designing His Own Wedding Dresses Now
text:
Say Yes to the Dress 's Randy Fenoli Is Designing His Own Wedding Dresses Now 
Holy Fenoli! Getty Advertisement - Continue Reading Below If you watch Say Yes to the Dress and Randy Fenoli's bridal fashion advice is the literal only thing that matters, you are in for a treat. The front man of the TLC show is launching his very own bridal collection, aptly titled Randy Fenoli Bridal, according to The Knot . On April 20, during Bridal Fashion Week, brides will be able to see all 25 designs at the Say Yes to the Dress store, Kleinfeld Bridal in NYC, and book appointments to try them on after their runway debut. A post shared by Randy Fenoli (@randyfenoli) on Feb 11, 2017 at 10:30am PST The sparkly designs (seen in the sketches below) will retail for $1,500 to $3,000. As for how they will look, think intricate beading and delicate floral appliqu√©s in flattering silhouettes. Facebook Advertisement - Continue Reading Below "A wedding gown is the most important piece of clothing a woman will ever wear, so to be able to create something she loves is the most rewarding feeling for me," Randy told The Knot . "My deep connection to brides inspired each piece in my premiere collection, and I am truly honored to be a part of making a woman feel her most beautiful." Just one more reason to say "Yes!" Get non-boring fashion and beauty news directly in your feed. Follow Facebook.com/CosmoBeauty . Follow Rachel on Twitter and Instagram . Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
